entry.title: How To Get Help
entry.summary:
Dr. Roger Peng's intuitive set of instructions for how to properly ask questions on a programming forum is quite entertaining and informative:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZFaWxxzouCY

His video presentation was inspired by this: http://www.catb.org/esr/faqs/smart-questions.html
